manage_app_settings: Manage your application settings and configurations.
select_category_manage_settings: Select a category from the sidebar to manage specific application settings.
configure_app_settings_description: Here you can configure various aspects of your application, from organization details to user management and security.
explore_settings_navigation_left: Explore the settings categories using the navigation on the left.
start_by_creating_new_role: You can start by creating a new role.
activity_logs_appear_here: Activity logs will appear here as users interact with the system.
add_extra_layer_security: Add an extra layer of security to your account.
requires_verification_code: Requires a verification code from your phone.
update_password_set_new: Update your password or set a new one.
see_where_logged_in: See where you are currently logged in.
advanced_security_settings_here: Advanced security settings will be here.
control_email_notifications: Control which email notifications you receive.
receive_email_new_issue: Receive an email when a new issue is reported in your building.
get_emails_announcements: Get emails for important building announcements.
receive_reminders_bill_due_dates: Receive reminders for upcoming bill due dates.
control_sms_notifications: Control which SMS notifications you receive.
get_sms_maintenance_work: Get SMS updates for maintenance work affecting your unit.
help_improve_suggestions: Help us improve by sharing your thoughts and suggestions.
subject: Subject
start_by_adding_new_building: You can start by adding a new building.
start_by_adding_new_unit: You can start by adding a new unit.
start_by_adding_new_user: You can start by adding a new user.
manage_tenant_information_leases: Manage tenant information and lease agreements.
leases_managed_here: Tenant and lease information will be managed here.
manage_all_properties_portfolio: Manage all properties within your portfolio.
portfolio_managed_here: Your property portfolio will be managed here.
track_manage_visitor_access: Track and manage visitor access to the property.
visitor_logs_managed_here: Visitor logs will be managed here.
